ie.wit.controller

Class LoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.wit.controller.LoginController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/login")
public class LoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This will be the only unsecured endpoint. Used to login to the system and return a JWT in the header for future Authentication
    Author:
    Joe Wemyss
